rules.description: Press F2 to rename a file (sends Return/Enter)
Press F9 to open Mission Control
[VS Code, Cursor, and Antigravity] Ctrl+Tab to Command+Tab
[VS Code, Cursor, and Antigravity] Cmd+Space to Ctrl+Space
Swap Command and Control in VS Code, Cursor, and Antigravity
Ctrl + Arrow Keys to Option + Arrow Keys [terminal]
Ctrl+L => Cmd+L (Open url location) (Only in browsers)
Ctrl + Shift + Arrow Keys to Option + Shift + Arrow Keys
Ctrl + BS/Del Keys to Option + BS/Del Keys
Ctrl + Arrow Keys to Option + Arrow Keys
